snippet: Ignacio Alfonso, part owner of the Cuban restaurant El Artesano in Union City, N.J., supports the easing of American restrictions against Cuba but thinks there is a long way to go before Cubans will be truly free.
abstract: Ignacio Alfonso, part owner of the Cuban restaurant El Artesano in Union City, N.J., supports the easing of American restrictions against Cuba but thinks there is a long way to go before Cubans will be truly free.

headline.main: Hope, and Caution, From a Cuban in New Jersey
